dcterms:description: CrossDocked2020 is the first large-scale standardized dataset for training ML models with ligand poses cross-docked against non-cognate receptor structure, greatly expanding the number of poses available for training. The dataset contains 22.5 million poses of ligands docked into multiple similar binding pockets across the PDB.
dcterms:title: CrossDocked2020

dcterms:creator: Z. Liu
M. Su
L. Han
J. Liu
Q. Yang
Y. Li
R. Wang
dcterms:description: PDBbind is a dataset that curates the Protein Data Bank (PDB) and is used for developing protein-ligand interaction scoring functions. It contains a collection of receptor-ligand complexes.
dcterms:title: PDBbind
